warscrolls.name: Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Incarnate, Fly, Ward (6+)

abilities.name: Wild Form
abilities.effect: Each time this **MANIFESTATION** is targeted by the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, if it would be banished, it is not banished. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Devourer of Magics
abilities.effect: If this **MANIFESTATION** destroyed any enemy **MANIFESTATIONS** this turn, **Heal (6)** this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Arcane Predator
abilities.effect: You can add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this **MANIFESTATION**, to a maximum of 3", while it is within 18" of any enemy **MANIFESTATIONS**, but if you do so, it must end the charge move within ½" of an enemy **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Tendrils of Light and Shadow
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use commands while they are within 3" of either part of this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

Each time this **MANIFESTATION** moves, both its parts must end within 9" of each other.

Each part of this **MANIFESTATION** is armed with **Tendrils of Light and Shadow**.

abilities.name: Arcane Passage
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **WIZARD** within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: The next time the target uses a non-**SUMMON** **SPELL** ability this phase, add 1 to the casting value of that spell. When picking targets for that spell, you can measure range and visibility from either part of this **MANIFESTATION** instead of from the caster, and your opponent can measure range and visibility to either part of this **MANIFESTATION** instead of to the caster for the purposes of the ‘Unbind’ ability.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Deathly Passage
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit wholly within 6" of one part of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the other part of this **MANIFESTATION** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Mechanisms of Time
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect:
If there are any friendly **WIZARDS** within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION**, pick 1 of the following effects:

***Increase Time Flow***: Until the start of your next turn, you can re roll charge rolls for friendly units while they are wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

***Decrease Time Flow***: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly **WIZARDS** while they are wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Dancing Blades
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted by this **MANIFESTATION**’s attacks.

abilities.name: Scything Blade
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** can move a distance up to its Move characteristic in one direction (see ‘The Pendulum Swings’). It can pass through models during that move and can end that move in combat. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units that this **MANIFESTATION** passed across during that move or that are within 1⁄2" of it to be the targets. Roll a dice for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: The Pendulum Swings
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** cannot use **CHARGE** or **FIGHT** abilities. In addition, when this **MANIFESTATION** moves, it must move in a straight line either in the direction in which the tip of the pendulum blade is pointing or in the opposite direction to the direction in which the tip of the pendulum blade is pointing.

abilities.name: Harbinger of Horror
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was targeted by this **MANIFESTATION**’s shooting attacks this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is less than the number of models in the target unit that were slain this phase, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Burning Up
abilities.effect: Each time this **MANIFESTATION** uses a **SHOOT** ability, after that ability has been resolved, allocate 1 damage point to this **MANIFESTATION** (ward rolls cannot be made for that damage point).

abilities.name: Morbid Detonation
abilities.declare: You must, and can only, use this ability if this unit has 6 **maelstrom points**. Pick each unit (friendly and enemy) within 9" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed.

abilities.name: Necrotic Vortex
abilities.effect:
Give this **MANIFESTATION** 1 maelstrom point each time:

• This **MANIFESTATION** is set up.
• A unit successfully casts a spell while it is within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.
• A model is slain within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

This **MANIFESTATION** can have a maximum of **6 maelstrom points** at once

abilities.name: Traverse the Tides of Death
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **INFANTRY WIZARD HERO** within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move but cannot end that move in combat. Then, remove the target from the battlefield and set them up again on the battlefield within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** and not in combat. Then, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Pulled to the Grave
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move but cannot end that move in combat. Then, you can pick an enemy unit that this **MANIFESTATION** passed across during that move to be the target. Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: End Given Form
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models during that move but cannot end that move in combat. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units that this **MANIFESTATION** passed across during that move to be the targets. Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Pull of the Nadir
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for friendly and enemy units while they are within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** cannot be targeted by shooting attacks. In addition, a unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks if it is impossible to draw a straight line from a model in the attacking unit to a model in the target unit without that line passing across this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Bounteous Healing
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: **Heal (3)** the target.

abilities.name: Restored Vigour
abilities.effect: **Heal (3)** this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Ensnaring Soul-Drain
abilities.effect: Each time an enemy unit uses a **MOVE** ability while it is within 9" of any parts of this **MANIFESTATION**, the effects of the ‘Fly’ ability do not apply to that unit. Enemy units cannot be set up within 9" of either part of this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Phantasmal Translocation
abilities.effect: Pick a part of this **MANIFESTATION**, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 9" of the other part and more than 3" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Bound for the Great Oubliette
abilities.declare: For each part of this **MANIFESTATION**, you can pick an enemy unit within 3" of that part to be the targets. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per turn.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Subtract a number of inches equal to the roll from the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and all its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: Ravening Hunger
abilities.declare: If this **MANIFESTATION** charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 10 dice. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Summon Geminids of Uhl-Gysh
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Geminids of Uhl-Gysh** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Geminids of Uhl-Gysh** endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A Geminids of Uhl-Gysh endless spell has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

spells.name: Summon Prismatic Palisade
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Prismatic Palisade** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Prismatic Palisade** wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Umbral Spellportal
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Umbral Spellportal** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up an **Umbral Spellportal** wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. An **Umbral Spellportal** has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

spells.name: Summon Malevolent Maelstrom
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Malevolent Maelstrom** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Malevolent Maelstrom** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Soulsnare Shackles
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Soulsnare Shackles** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Soulsnare Shackles** endless spell wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. A **Soulsnare Shackles** endless spell has 3 parts that must each be set up within 3" of at least 1 other part.

spells.name: Summon Purple Sun of Shyish
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Purple Sun of Shyish** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Purple Sun of Shyish** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Suffocating Gravetide
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Suffocating Gravetide** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Suffocating Gravetide** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Horrorghast
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Horrorghast** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Horrorghast** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Shards of Valagharr
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Shards of Valagharr** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Shards of Valagharr** endless spell wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. A **Shards of Valagharr** endless spell has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

spells.name: Summon Soulscream Bridge
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Soulscream Bridge** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Soulscream Bridge** wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. A **Soulscream Bridge** has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

spells.name: Summon Lauchon the Soulseeker
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Lauchon the Soulseeker** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Lauchon the Soulseeker** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Burning Head
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **The Burning Head** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up **The Burning Head** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Emerald Lifeswarm
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Emerald Lifeswarm** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up an **Emerald Lifeswarm** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Ravenak's Gnashing Jaws
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Ravenak’s Gnashing Jaws** endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Krondspine Incarnate of Ghur** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Aethervoid Pendulum
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Aethervoid Pendulum** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up an **Aethervoid Pendulum** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Chronomantic Cogs
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Chronomantic Cogs** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Chronomantic Cogs** endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Quicksilver Swords
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Quicksilver Swords** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Quicksilver Swords** endless spell wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
